title: Skin packs useless
body:
So i just want ravenborn leblanc, but the only way to buy it is spend 2.3k RP points on champions i already have. I just want ravenborn leblanc!!!!
Is their any way to just buy ravenborn?

replies.body:
Only ways to get Vaulted skins are

A. Wait for the event time (in her case Halloween)
B. Mystery Gifting (and hope you get it)
C. Buy them in the bundles they get placed in.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hApxaao4,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-18T20:05:44.753+0000)
>
> Yup! This is correct.

can you gift me ravenborn leblanc please! take out the RP of my account and purchase for me! Or if you donate the skin to me ill donate money to a charity of your choice?

1) They can't do that

2) What reason do they have to trust you?

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hApxaao4,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T20:24:02.868+0000)
>
> 1) They can't do that
> 
> 2) What reason do they have to trust you?

im rich
If your rich, just buy the self mystery gifts until you get the skin.
Unfortunately not. D: That wouldn't be fair to everyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hApxaao4,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-18T21:07:36.531+0000)
>
> Unfortunately not. D: That wouldn't be fair to everyone else.

Is your skin team going to update older skins like pulsefire ezreal? I think he needs a visual update. His spells and abilties arent worth the money and not even close to being as cool as Dj Sona and Spiritguard udyr
Have to wait until halloween again
Just be glad that they put Ravenborn in a bundle, otherwise you have to wait another 7 months.
